resources.string: Covaxin (codenamed as BBV152) is an inactivated virus-based COVID-19 vaccine developed by Bharat Biotech in collaboration with the Indian Council of Medical Research - National Institute of Virology.

App1 is a app made to remove all the misconceptions and fears regarding the approved Covid-19 vaccine. App1 help you pick and choose the vaccine which might be best option for you. It also helps you know about the side affects of the vaccine and maintains utmost transparency with you.

Select the answer from the options given. Each time you get an answer correct, you advance to the next question.\n\nIf you get the answer wrong, your game ends! You can return to the title screen using up or back from within the game screen, and this will also end your game.
